About

I'm a developer and designer passionate about building tools that make learning and productivity more accessible. From educational platforms to research tools, I love combining clean code with thoughtful UX to solve real problems.

Skills

Languages: TypeScript, Python, Java, C++, SQL
Frontend: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Three.js
Backend: Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL, Firebase
Tools: Git, Figma, Vercel, AWS, Docker
Design: UI/UX, Prototyping, User Research, A/B Testing
